signup.title: Sign Up
signup.idError: Please enter an ID that includes both letters and numbers and is at least 6 characters long.

signupStep1.title: Phone Verification
signupStep1.description: For seamless use of the onul service, one-time verification is required.
signupStep1.note: Only one account can be linked to a single phone number.
signupStep1.timeOverMessage: Verification time has expired. Please request again.
signupStep1.invalidPhoneMessage: Please enter a valid phone number.
signupStep1.alreadyPhoneNumber: A phone number can only be used once per account.
signupStep1.limitExceeded: Request limit exceeded. Please try again later.
signupStep1.dailyLimitExceeded: Daily request limit exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.
signupStep1.connectionError: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
signupStep1.messageReceiveNote: Please disable international message blocking to receive messages.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.checkInfoBeforeLeaving: Before you leave, please check the information below.
accountInfo.subscriptionNotice: Even if you delete your Onul account, your subscription will not be automatically canceled. Subscription cancellations must be handled separately.
accountInfo.dataDeletionNotice: When you delete your account, all associated data will be removed. However, some data required by legal obligations will be retained for a certain period and will be deleted afterward.
accountInfo.deleteSpecificData: If you want to delete specific data without deleting your account, please request it through the Inquiry function.
accountInfo.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountInfo.deleteConfirmMessage: Once you delete your account, all associated data will be removed permanently and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountInfo.errorMessage: Sorry, there is a problem with the server. Please contact support for assistance.

subscription.title: Premium Membership
subscription.priceChangeNotice: Price may change in the future
subscription.cancelNoticeIos: You can disable auto-renewal anytime in the Apple App Store.
subscription.cancelNoticeAndroid: You can disable auto-renewal anytime in the Google Play Store.
subscription.purchaseNoticeIos: Upon confirmation of purchase, the fee will be charged to your Apple account.
subscription.renewalNoticeIos: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
subscription.purchaseNoticeAndroid: Upon confirmation of purchase, the fee will be charged to your Google Play account.
subscription.renewalNoticeAndroid: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
subscription.freeTrialNotice: Currently on a free trial. AI Auto-Adaptation will require a subscription after the trial ends.
